title: Find the Missing Shipment
content:
e nearby mountain, labeled "An Open letter on oppression and Peacocks." Yet another letter can be discovered just to the right of the first one, titled "As per my last letter." Near this last letter, an important body holds a Quest Item named "Shipment Orders," which activates the quest "Find the Missing Shipment" and updates your quest journal.

Proceed in the direction of the Northwest until you discover a cave (X:40 Y:626) where Gnolls are attacking survivors from an earlier attack. In this l
